verse.lines: {lang-eng}When this poor lisping, stammering tongue, Lies silent in the grave, Then in a nobler, sweeter song, I’ll sing Thy power to save, I’ll sing Thy power to save, I’ll sing Thy power to save, Then in a nobler, sweeter song, I’ll sing Thy power to save.{/lang-eng}
